casebody.data:
SUMMERLIN SPECIALISTS, INC., a Nevada Corporation; and John C. West, an Individual, Appellants,
v.
Wesley P. SMITH, an Individual; and as Trustee of the Smith and Otto Revocable Trust, Dated August 2, 2000, Respondents. No. 77059 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 06, 2019

Dismissed.
